name: Hogaru
headline: Hogaru is a tech-enabled home services platform in Latin America.
description: Hogaru provides professional cleaning and maintainance services to homes and micro businesses in Latin America. Differently from marketplaces, we employ directly our cleaners, to foster retention and quality of service.

# ¡Somos empresa líder en servicios de aseo!
## Encontramos la empleada doméstica ideal para tu hogar. 
Busco empleada
[Busco trabajo](https://www.hogaru.com/</opciones-de-empleo>)
Selecciona tu ciudad Armenia Barranquilla Bogotá Bucaramanga Cajicá Cali Cartagena Chía Cota Cúcuta Envigado Espinal Facatativá Floridablanca Fusagasugá Girardot Girardota Ibagué Jamundí La Calera La Ceja La Mesa La Vega Madrid Manizales Medellín Montería Mosquera Neiva Palmira Pasto Pereira Popayán Rionegro Sabaneta Santa Marta Soacha Sogamoso Soledad Sopó Tabio Tenjo Tobia Tocancipá Tunja Villa de Leyva Villeta Yumbo Zipaquirá
Selecciona tu ciudad

## Lo que nuestros clientes y profesionales opinan sobre Hogarú
Al finalizar nuestros servicios de limpieza, recibimos las opiniones y calificaciones de nuestros usuarios.

generated_description:
Hogaru is a tech-enabled home services platform based in Bogotá, Colombia, that’s carving a niche in Latin America’s cleaning and maintenance industry. Founded in 2015 and an alum of the Y Combinator W17 batch, Hogaru operates with a key differentiator: unlike other marketplace models, they directly employ their cleaning professionals. This approach fosters retention and ensures a higher quality of service, which can be a game changer in an industry often plagued by high turnover and inconsistent quality.

With a robust team of 746 employees, Hogaru provides cleaning services not only for homes but also for micro businesses. Their mission is simple yet compelling: to offer reliable and professional cleaning solutions that customers can trust.

### Services Offered
Hogaru’s offerings include routine home cleaning, employee onboarding for those looking to hire assistance, and contract management services for businesses. They emphasize customer satisfaction and actively seek feedback after every service, showcasing a commitment to improvement and customer experience.

### Why Hogaru Stands Out
Hogaru’s model is particularly notable for its focus on direct employment, which not only supports the workers with job stability and benefits but also gives customers peace of mind knowing their service is consistent and of high quality. Their efforts to maintain a positive work environment reflect in the feedback from both clients and employees, who often commend the professionalism and dedication of the staff.

### The Bigger Picture
Operating in a market that’s ripe for disruption, Hogaru aligns itself with powerful tech trends and the growing demand for home services, particularly in urban areas. As Latin America continues to experience significant growth in the tech and service sectors, platforms like Hogaru stand as testament to the value of blending technology with traditional service jobs—creating better work conditions, enhancing service quality, and ensuring customer satisfaction.

For more information or to access their services, you can visit [Hogaru's official website](https://www.hogaru.com/).
